titleStmt.title: The lives of the illustrious Romans writ in Latin by Sextus Aurelius Victor ; and translated by several young gentlemen educated by Mr. Maidwell.
De viris illustribus urbis Romeo. English.
titleStmt.author: Pliny, the Younger.
Suetonius, ca. 69-ca. 122.
Nepos, Cornelius.
Victor, Sextus Aurelius.
Maidwell, Lewis, 1650-1715.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for S. Smith and B. Walford ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of an anonymous work, which has been ascribed successively to the younger Pliny, Suetonius, Cornelius Nepos and Sex. Aurelius Victor.
Pages 13-14, 18, 30, and 54 are tightly bound in filmed copy. Beginning-p. 57 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at the end.
The life of Sextus Aurelius Victor: p. [18].
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
